title: SEC's 'Scathing' Charges Against Binance Deal a Big Blow to US Crypto
description: The SEC alleges that the world’s largest crypto exchange and its founder, Changpeng Zhao, lied to regulators and put customers and investors at risk.

title: Chegg Embraced AI. ChatGPT Ate Its Lunch Anyway
description: The education company is a case study in generative AI’s disruptive power. Now it's trying to prove it can beat back ChatGPT with an in-house chatbot.

title: Inside 4chan’s Top-Secret Moderation Machine
description: Internal company documents reveal how the imageboard’s chaotic moderation allowed racism and violence to take over.
